name: Luminous
description: E-commerce platform that enables brands to manage orders, inventory, purchasing, and shipping in a high-volume, multi-tenant environment.
contribution: I built and optimized high-volume order workflows, creating queued processes that handle large item sets and complex operational logic.
contributionDetails: Built and optimized full-stack workflows for high-volume order processing
Simplified complex workflows into faster inline and bulk actions
Improved performance by optimizing backend logic and reducing database operations

name: Dentalfast
description: Web application that helps dental labs and clinics manage and track deliveries, making logistics simpler and more reliable.
contribution: I built a complete web application from scratch, including the interface and backend systems.
contributionDetails: Created features for tracking deliveries, managing schedules, and keeping everyone informed
Designed database structure with proper relationships and indexes as data grows
Implemented responsive design for computers, tablets, and phones
Built with scalability in mind from the start, ensuring system works well as usage increases
